name: 单词训练营 | Word Training Camp
name_original: 单词训练营 | Word Training Camp
description:
Steam can also start learning. Come and buy our vocabulary training camp.

This is a fun game to teach, you can shoot, experience the fun of the game, while reciting words. We have many modes, such as practice, challenge, translation and so on. Each mode has a shooting range, so that you can learn English without being bored.



The game includes:

Optional Lexicon: Including junior high school and senior high school, from essential life vocabulary to IELTS Band 4 and Band 6.

Exercise mode: You can start to memorize words, give Chinese meaning and English, and remember them.

Challenge mode: Challenge the lexicon to see if you remember the words you learned.

Inter-translation mode: Give Chinese, shoot the Chinese meaning of the right, enhance your Chinese-English interaction ability.

New Word Book: The game includes new word book. Words that are not memorized can be practiced repeatedly.



The best vocabulary learning game is here. You need to learn your vocabulary. Why don't you try it?
